Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.resource

Class ResourceStock

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.resource.ResourceStock
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ResourceDepot
public class ResourceStock
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Class that models the stocks of resources.
See Also:
Serialized Form

      Returns:

    • incrementResource

      public void incrementResource​(ResourceType resourceType) throws java.lang.Exception
      Increment by one the quantity of resources contained in the stock (only if the ResourceType of the new stock correspond to the one already contained).
      Parameters:
      resourceType - the type of the new resource
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

    • incrementResource

      public void incrementResource​(ResourceType resourceType, int quantity) throws java.lang.Exception
      Increment by a quantity the quantity of resources contained in the stock (only if the ResourceType of the new stock correspond to the one already contained).
      Parameters:
      resourceType - the type of the new resource
      quantity - the quantity of resources to add
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception
